title: The Harvesters
description: When she finds her boyfriend shackled to a white metal table Ashley fears for the worst. On a small road trip of dropping off a package for Jasonâ€™s father, the young couple never thought they would be running for their lives. Running away from supposedly friends whom in turn to be a family of harvesters.  Human harvesters and they're looking for something specific. And Ashley just might be the perfect match.
author: Diane Ehlers
